name: 9th International Conference on Applied Research in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: Get ready to dive into the excitement at the 9th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Accounting in Bangkok, Thailand, happening from November 8th to 10th, 2024! It’s going to be an electrifying blend of keynotes, interactive sessions, and virtual hangouts for those tuning in from afar. Got research to share? We’ve got you covered with publishing opportunities in top-tier journals and Conference Proceedings such as SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, Google Scholar, COPERNICUS, and Web of Science. The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of Bangkok free of charge. Mark your calendars for important dates: Paper submission deadline: October 21, 2024 Early bird registration deadline: June 25, 2024 Early registration deadline: August 26, 2024 Late registration deadline: October 29, 2024 In recognition of their participation, in-person attendees and speakers will receive a formal Letter of Invitation following registration. Moreover, the conference extends its reach beyond geographical boundaries, accommodating virtual participation through live-streamed sessions for those unable to attend in person. Whether you’re presenting your findings, soaking up knowledge, or just here for the good times, this conference is your ticket to a few days of learning, networking, and unforgettable experiences in one of Asia’s most vibrant cities. See you there!
